feed.title: Google Cloud: Firestore in Datastore mode
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Firestore in Datastore mode

entry.content: The database clone feature is now supported at the General Availability (GA) level.
entry.summary: The database clone feature is now supported at General Availability.
entry.title: Feature: Database cloning is now GA

entry.content:
A weekly digest of client library updates from across the Cloud SDK.

Java

Changes for google-cloud-datastore

2.32.3 (2025-10-20)

Bug Fixes
  • deps: Update the Java code generator (gapic-generator-java) to 2.63.0 (b9b95cb)
Dependencies
  • Update dependency com.google.cloud:sdk-platform-java-config to v3.53.0 (#1980) (1520b7c)
entry.summary: This release includes dependency updates for the Java Datastore client library, specifically for the Java code generator and the SDK platform Java config.
entry.title: Libraries: Java Datastore Client Library Update

entry.title: Libraries: Client Library Updates

entry.content: Use Query insights to view query performance metrics for your database. This feature is now generally available (GA).
entry.summary: Query insights is now generally available. Use this feature to view query performance metrics for your database.
entry.title: Feature: Query insights now GA

entry.content: You can clone an existing database at a selected timestamp into a new database. This feature is available in Preview.
entry.title: Feature: Clone database
